languages.text: Ваш персонаж только что промахнулся! Чтобы повысить шанс попасть по противнику, разместите персонажа в выгодной позиции. Для меткой стрельбы из огнестрельного оружия изучайте таланты, повышающие характеристики {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}. Атаки в ближнем бою не проходят проверку на попадание, но враг может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от них. Изучение талантов, которые повышают Восприятие, снизит шанс противника избежать вашей атаки.
languages.original_text: Your character have just missed! To increase the chance to hit, equip your character with an efficient weapon and place them at the vantage point. Abilities and talents that improve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} characteristic will help you hit more often in {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}close combat{/g}. For improved marksmanship, learn talents that increase {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} characteristics.

traits.locale_text:
Ваш персонаж только что промахнулся! Чтобы повысить шанс попасть по противнику, используйте эффективное оружие и займите выгодную позицию.
Чаще попадать в ближнем бою помогут способности и таланты, повышающие характеристику {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}.
Для меткой стрельбы из огнестрельного оружия изучайте таланты, повышающие характеристики {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}.

Чаще попадать в ближнем бою помогут способности и таланты, повышающие характеристику {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}.
Для меткой стрельбы из огнестрельного оружия изучайте таланты, повышающие характеристики {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}.

To increase {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g}, equip your character with a decent weapon and place them on a vantage point. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} that improve the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} characteristic will help you hit more often in close combat. For improved marksmanship, learn talents that increase the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} characteristics.

traits.locale_text:
Your character missed! To increase the chance to hit, equip your character with a quality weapon and place them in a vantage point.
Abilities and talents that improve Weapon Skill ability will help you hit more often in close combat.
For improved marksmanship with firearms, learn talents that increase Perception and Ballistic Skill.

languages.text: ¡Tu personaje acaba de fallar! Para aumentar la {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g}, equipa a tu personaje con un arma digna y colócalo en una buena posición. Las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} que mejoran la característica {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} te ayudarán a impactar con más frecuencia en las distancias cortas. Para mejorar la puntería a distancia, aprende talentos que aumenten las características de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}.

To increase {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g}, equip your character with a decent weapon and place them on a vantage point. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} that improve the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} characteristic will help you hit more often in close combat. For improved marksmanship, learn talents that increase the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} characteristics.

traits.locale_text: ¡Tu personaje acaba de fallar! Para aumentar la {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g}, equipa a tu personaje con un arma digna y colócalo en una buena posición. Las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} que mejoran la característica {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} te ayudarán a impactar con más frecuencia en las distancias cortas. Para mejorar la puntería a distancia, aprende talentos que aumenten las características de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}.

languages.text: 外した！{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}を上げるには、適切な武器を装備し、見晴らしの良い場所に配置しなければならない。 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}特性{/g}を向上させる{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}アビリティ{/g}や能力は、接近戦での命中率を高めるのに役立つ。 射撃技術を向上させるには、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道技術{/g}の特性を向上させる才能を習得する。
languages.original_text: Your character has just missed! To increase {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g}, equip your character with a decent weapon and place them on a vantage point. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} that improve the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} characteristic will help you hit more often in close combat. For improved marksmanship, learn talents that increase the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} characteristics.

traits.locale_text: 外した！{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}を上げるには、適切な武器を装備し、見晴らしの良い場所に配置しなければならない。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}の特性を向上させる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}は、接近戦での{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}率を高めるのに役立つ。 射撃技術を向上させるには、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道技術{/g}の特性を向上させる才能を習得する。

外した！{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}を上げるには、適切な武器を装備し、見晴らしの良い場所に配置しなければならない。 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}特性{/g}を向上させる{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}アビリティ{/g}や能力は、接近戦での命中率を高めるのに役立つ。 射撃技術を向上させるには、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道技術{/g}の特性を向上させる才能を習得する。

languages.text: 您的角色刚刚未能命中敌人！若要提高{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}，请为角色配备合适的武器，占领有利位置进行攻击。 部分{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}可以提高{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}这一属性，让您的角色在近战中更容易命中目标。 若想提高射击命中率，可以学习相关天赋，提高{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}这两种属性。

For improved marksmanship, learn talents that increase the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} characteristics.

traits.locale_text: 您的角色刚刚未能命中敌人！若要提高{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}，请为角色配备合适的武器，占领有利位置进行攻击。 部分{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}可以提高{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}这一属性，让您的角色在近战中更容易{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标。 若想提高射击命中率，可以学习相关天赋，提高{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}这两种属性。

您的角色刚刚未能命中敌人！若要提高{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}，请为角色配备合适的武器，占领有利位置进行攻击。 部分{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}可以提高{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}这一属性，让您的角色在近战中更容易命中目标。 若想提高射击命中率，可以学习相关天赋，提高{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}这两种属性。

languages.text: Dein Charakter hat sein Ziel verfehlt! Um die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} zu erhöhen, rüste deinen Charakter mit einer guten Waffe aus und nimm eine vorteilhafte Position ein. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g}, die die Eigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} verbessern, helfen dir, im Nahkampf häufiger zu treffen. Um die Treffsicherheit im Fernkampf zu verbessern, lerne Talente, die die Eigenschaften {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} erhöhen.
languages.original_text: Your character has just missed! To increase {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g}, equip your character with a decent weapon and place them on a vantage point. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} that improve the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} characteristic will help you hit more often in close combat. For improved marksmanship, learn talents that increase the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} characteristics.

traits.locale_text: Dein Charakter hat soeben verfehlt! Um die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} zu erhöhen, rüste deinen Charakter mit einer guten Waffe aus und platziere ihn in einer vorteilhaften Position. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g}, die die Eigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} verbessern, werden dir helfen, im Nahkampf öfter zu {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}. Um die Treffsicherheit im Fernkampf zu verbessern, lerne Talente, die die Eigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistische Fähigkeit{/g} erhöhen.

Dein Charakter hat sein Ziel verfehlt! Um die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} zu erhöhen, rüste deinen Charakter mit einer guten Waffe aus und nimm eine vorteilhafte Position ein. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g}, die die Eigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} verbessern, helfen dir, im Nahkampf häufiger zu treffen. Um die Treffsicherheit im Fernkampf zu verbessern, lerne Talente, die die Eigenschaften {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} erhöhen.

languages.text: Votre personnage vient de manquer sa cible ! Pour augmenter les {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances de toucher{/g}, équipez votre personnage d'une arme convenable et placez-le à une position avantageuse. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} qui améliorent la caractéristique {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} vous aident à infliger plus souvent des coups au corps à corps. Pour améliorer votre adresse au tir, apprenez les talents qui augmentent les caractéristiques {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}.
languages.original_text: Your character has just missed! To increase {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g}, equip your character with a decent weapon and place them on a vantage point. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} that improve the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} characteristic will help you hit more often in close combat. For improved marksmanship, learn talents that increase the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} characteristics.

Pour augmenter les {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances de toucher{/g}, équipez votre personnage d'une arme convenable et placez-le à une position avantageuse. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} qui améliorent la caractéristique {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} vous aident à infliger plus souvent des coups au corps à corps. languages.text: Karakterin az önce ıskaladı! {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Vuruş olasılığını{/g} artırmak için karakterini iyi bir silahla donat ve avantajlı bir noktaya yerleştir. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliğini artıran {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceriler{/g}, yakın çatışmalarda daha çok isabet ettirmene yardımcı olur. Daha iyi nişancılık için {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerini artıran beceriler edin.
